Date: 2024-10-22 13:00
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION (RE-OPENING) | SWAROVSKI- Mall of Emirates- Boutique
--------------------------------------------------
Thank you Nasser for your kind words ðŸ˜Š

So far we reopened 5 stores (3 in KSA and 2 in UAE) and we have 2 more to go within the next 2 weeks ! 1 in UAE in Galleria Abu Dhabi and a Mega store in KWT  ðŸ˜Š

We are truly looking forward to it !

 

Thank you for everyone involved and looking forward to finalize our 2024 renovation & opening and kick off next year plan !

 

Kind regards, 

Benedicte

> >; Retail Operations UAE <Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com <mailto:Retail.Operations.UAE@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RSO UAE - STORE RENOVATION (RE-OPENING) | SWAROVSKI- Mall of Emirates- Boutique 

 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the re-opening of Swarovski- Mall of Emirates- Boutique

 

The store was temporary closed for renovation and has re-opened its doors to Guests starting 21st October 2024 at 10 AM.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team @Omar Alaridi <mailto:Omar.Alaridi@chalhoub.com>  @Jessica Wendt <mailto:Jessica.Wendt@chalhoub.com>  @Mohammed Meraj <mailto:Mohammed.Khan@chalhoub.com>  @Yusuf Arikady <mailto:Yusuf.Arikady@chalhoub.com>  @Hiba Khazaal <mailto:Hiba.Khazaal@chalhoub.com>  @Swarovski MOE <mailto:Swarovski.MOE@chalhoub.com>
